#include<iostream>
using namespace std;


int power(int n,unsigned long long k ,int m=1000000007)  //return n^k % m
{
 if(k==1) return n;
 unsigned long long f=power(n,k/2,m);
 //cout<<"#"<<f<<"#";
 unsigned long long p=(f*f)%m;
 //t=f*f;
 //cout<<t;
 //p=(t)%m;
 if(k%2!=0)
  p=(p*n)%m;

 return p;
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,k,num;
    cin>>t;

    for(int v=0;v<t;v++)
    {
        cin>>k>>n;
        if(n==1)
        {
            cout<<1<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        if(n==2||n==3)
        {
            cout<<k<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        num=power(2,n-3,1000000006);
        num=power(k,num);

        cout<<num<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
